data.persona: I am a robber who lurks outside the village. Every night I wait for travelers journeying out onto the main thoroughfare. When they are near, I jump from behind the bushes with my longsword in my hand. They usually cower in fear and I take their money.
data.description:
You are in the nearby road.
The road cuts through the countryside. It is a dirt road, with a fence lining the eastern side and a grassy meadow to the west.
The horse and the traveler are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to set up camp for the night after another successful robbery.
data.mid_motivation: I need to collect more comforts and luxury items from travelers if I am to stay in this area much longer.
data.long_motivation: I want enough money and goods for trade to be able to move to a different kingdom, where my family is being held captive by an evil tyrant.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: get dirt from from the road and begin collecting it.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: steal wood from the fence from whomever owns the land on the eastern side.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield dirt and throw it in the horses face as it trots down the road, blinding it. The traveler falls off the horse, hits his head on the dirt road and is knocked out. The horse runs away.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal any and all possessions, including the sleeping bag from the traveler.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go a more secluded part of the grassy meadow, using the sleeping bag to carry a haul of firewood, stolen from the nearby fence.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: drink water from the traveler's canteen beside the fire I have made, too far away for any villagers to see.
